meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds found in petroleum.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the sterane under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The sterane in the oil sample indicated its origin.
meanings.sent3: The sterane decided to throw a party for all the other compounds.
meanings.sent4: The sterane stood out in the mixture like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The distinct smell of sterane filled the lab, making it easy to identify.

meanings.definition: A type of biomarker used in geology to indicate the presence of ancient organic matter.
meanings.sent1: The sterane revealed the age of the organic matter in the rock.
meanings.sent2: Geologists rely on sterane to uncover ancient secrets hidden in the earth.
meanings.sent3: The sterane joked with the fossils about their ancient history.
meanings.sent4: The sterane acted as a time traveler, unlocking the past in the rocks.
meanings.sent5: The sterane glowed brightly, illuminating the presence of organic matter.
